universe_note: Ranked only the provided NASDAQ/NYSE packets that pass liquidity gates (avg_dollar_volume_20d >= $50M, price >= $2). Exclusion checks for >15% last 5 trading days, halts, and verified dated catalysts could not be fully validated from packets; where catalyst timing could not be verified within 7 trading days, Catalyst score was capped per rules.

top5.name: Amphenol Corporation

target.bear_case_note: Breaks below short-term trend (loses MA20/MA50 confluence) and fails to hold recent breakout attempt; broad AI-hardware risk-off tape.

primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Multiple same-week headlines point to renewed AI data-center demand narrative and a technical breakout attempt, which can drive incremental flows even without a scheduled event.

top5.name: Transocean Ltd.

target.bear_case_note: Breaks below $4.14-$4.20 (MA20/MA10 area) and backlog narrative fails to attract follow-on buying; high leverage/credit concerns re-emerge.

primary_catalyst.title: New rig contracts / backlog additions ($168M) (breaking catalyst)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Contract wins and backlog growth are key drivers for offshore drillers; multiple same-day headlines reinforce the backlog-add narrative and can spark short-term momentum moves.

risk_factors: High leverage/offshore driller risk; negative credit/analyst actions can reverse momentum quickly (packet includes prior downgrade headline).
Low absolute price increases gap/volatility risk; position sizing critical.

top5.name: Dollar Tree, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Momentum stalls near highs and RSI mean-reverts; any negative retail read-through or reversal in defensive rotation breaks the trend.
